Marilyn Symmes collection of art exhibition ephemera
Series IV. Architecture & New York City-related Exhibitions
Series IV. Architecture & New York City-related Exhibitions

The series holds items pertaining to exhibitions related to architecture and/or New York City. The category includes all those items so designated by the collector/donor. By the donor's count, there are about 37 items in the series.
